PROJECT.NAME: gfCryBron
PROJECT.TITLE: Cryptotrichosporon brontae
PROJECT.DESCRIPTION: This project collects the sequencing data and assemblies generated for Cryptotrichosporon brontae by the European Reference Genome Atlas (ERGA, https://www.erga-biodiversity.eu/) for the Biodiversity Genomics Europe project (BGE, https://biodiversitygenomics.eu/).
